amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment, within the Office of the Secretary, of the Office for State and Local Government Coordination to oversee and coordinate departmental programs for and relationships with State and local governments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 107-615 to establish within the Office of the Secretary an office to oversee and coordinate developmental programs for and relationships with state and local governments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
